---
title: DLS Technology
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: dls_technology
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.3M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with DLS Technology. The average
  contract duration was 1.25 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $179.8K. The longest
  contract was 5.17 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.3M.
lookup_name: 'DLS TECHNOLOGY'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.3M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '84'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '10'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '12%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '80%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.2'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '775.4K'
s424_mean_duration: '1.25'
s421_mean_contract_value: '179.8K'
s425_max_duration: '5.17'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.3M'
---
